haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Augustus Kass
Ltn Johann Hanneman
Ltn Luther Schaumann

 The mission was flown from Balatre,E Roye aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 02/08/1916 near Foncquevillers.
A F.E.2b of No 8 Squadron RFC was brought down by Wolfram Tendler of Jasta 16b.
Lt Robert Clopton was killed in action.
Lt Ian Bernewelt was killed in action.
Wolfram Tendler was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
